attributes.action: create mashups of his speeches to popular songs
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: 'Mashups' are pieces of music where elements of two songs are taken and mashed together- Enya VS Prodigy, for example. If the PM's speeches are mashed with songs, then it will be very popular with young people.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
